## Extra Resources

The [UCLA Statistical Consulting Group](https://stats.oarc.ucla.edu/) has create
an excellent tutorial on CFA with **lavaan**. If you're still struggling with
CFA or implementing CFA in **lavaan**, check out the UCLA tutorial (embedded below).

- You can access the tutorial on the UCLA site via [this link](https://stats.oarc.ucla.edu/r/seminars/rcfa/).
